description: Schema for base data attached to the page view event

content.description: Descriptive name of the page in english in the format: [maincategory]/[subcategory1]/[subcategory2]/[subcategory3]/[productid] Corresponding to emospro.content for econda

content_lang.description: Like content but translated in current language

cart_status.description: Tracks the information if the cart is a new, resumed (user has already a cart, when entring the webiste) or merged cart or no-cart as default value

layout-variant.description: Which layout is being displayed (not device type!)

layout-orientation.description: Which screen orientation is being displayed. pm = portraitmode, lm = landscapemode

pwa.description: Tracks if users browser is in 'standalone'-mode, and therefore the PWA (progressive web app) is displayed
